name: Haunting in the Woods
description:
Walking through the haunted woods, your goal is to obtain a score of 36 by picking up the fruit and muffins.  The main fruit to obtain your score is the oranges.  There are three types of power-ups (3 muffins, 1 apple, 1 banana).  The power-ups not only increase your health by 1, but also your score by 1. 

Your health starts at 4 and your score at 0.  As you walk through the woods, you are being attacked by ghosts and a flying bat.  Each of these enemies take a point from your health.  When you use a power-up, it turns the ghost (not the bat) a different color and moves them away from you for a few seconds.

To play the game you only need to use the left and right arrow keys.

If you obtain a score of 36 and your health is not at 0, You Win!

 Should your health ever reach 0, Game over!
